title: Phone not charging
content: My google pixel 3 will not charge - initially it just wasn't registering the fact a cable was connected. I cleaned out the port and also the charger itself and now it will register a cable if I fiddle with it a bit but even so it shows 0% inside the expanding circle which shows it's charging and then the screen just goes black again after a few minutes. It never gets past 0% . I don't have another cable to try but have tried several different outlets. I also had an issue earlier this evening where it took several attempts before the phone realised my earphones were connected so I'm thinking it could be the port.
